question: I'm actually 17 and I'm hypoglycemic. So I'm used to dizziness I just eat some peanut butter and move on but I'm dizzy 5 or 6x a day. I'm 5 weeks and some days along, is this normal? Is the baby okay in there ? Does being hypoglycemic mean I'm more likely to get gestational diabetes?
title: dizziness to the max
